Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe fans are desperately looking for something to smile about.
For Afghanistan, their agenda is to get back into the swing of things ahead of the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The afternoon start means the track should be a good one for batting right away, as opposed to the morning where the ball often moves around more.
Others: Rashid Khan vs Sikandar Raza in T20Is: 46 balls, 41 runs conceded, two wickets.
